REPORT.name: Трафик по компьютерам
REPORT.description: Name: Отчет по трафику, показывает объем в МБ по компьютерам за указанный интервал времени Author: NodaSoft E-mail: support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code:
if object_id('tempdb..#ttc') is not null DROP TABLE #ttc
CREATE TABLE #ttc ( [id] [int] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL , [number] [int], [ipaddress] [varchar] (15) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL, [traffic_MB] [numeric] (12,2) NULL, [traffic_KB] [numeric] (12,2) NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
INSERT INTO #ttc (number,ipaddress,traffic_MB, traffic_KB) select 0, N'Итого:', sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024/1024 [traffic in MB], sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024 [traffic in KB] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (SessionsAdd.idSessions = Sessions.id) --left join Computers on (SessionsAdd.idComp = Computers.id) where Sessions.[started] > %TIME-START% and Sessions.[started] < %TIME-STOP%
INSERT INTO #ttc (number,ipaddress,traffic_MB, traffic_KB) VALUES (0, N'---------------', 0 , 0 )
insert into #ttc (number,ipaddress,traffic_MB, traffic_KB) select S.number, S.ipaddress, sum(CAST(S.traffic as [numeric] (12,2)))/1024/1024 [traffic in MB], sum(CAST(S.traffic as [numeric] (12,2)))/1024 [traffic in KB] from (select distinct Sessions.id,traffic,started,number,ipaddress from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (SessionsAdd.idSessions = Sessions.id) left join Computers on (SessionsAdd.idComp = Computers.id) where Sessions.[started] > %TIME-START% and Sessions.[started] < %TIME-STOP% ) As S group by S.number, S.ipaddress order by S.number
SELECT number [Computer], ipaddress [IP], traffic_MB [traffic in MB], traffic_KB [traffic in KB] FROM #ttc
